parameter 1: Opening version (1982) runs 67 min with a narrator (Michaël Lonsdale). Director's cut (1988) runs 52 min without narration.
parameter 2: The double feature from Video Asia runs at 85 minutes long.
parameter 3: A new version was released for the Playstation, complete with new anime scenes and a comprehensive database of items, maps, music, bosses, monsters, and endings.
parameter 4: A new version was released for the Playstation, complete with new anime scenes and a comprehensive database of items, maps, music, bosses, monsters, and endings.
parameter 5: Master Of Disaster, the English dubbed US release, includes three unrelated scenes with Jackie Chan from _The Protector (1985)_ (qv).
parameter 6: The Chinese characters with English subtitles which tell about Kawashima Yoshiko's later role in WWII as she's leaving on the ship is removed from the Universe DVD.
parameter 7: The double feature from Video Asia runs at 85 minutes long.
parameter 8: Produced in 2 versions with different endings concerning fate of Kawashima. Hong Kong laserdisc has song lyrics on screen for the more upbeat ending but the song (sung by Anita Mui herself) is not on the soundtrack and the disc is the shorter more final ending.
parameter 9: A new version was released for the Playstation, complete with new anime scenes and a comprehensive database of items, maps, music, bosses, monsters, and endings.
parameter 10: When reissued by Lippert in the 1950s, the film was "revised" and cut, first to 93 minutes, then to 78. This version is titled "Ali Baba Nights."

parameter 27: Fulltime Killer has an alternate ending which played in Malaysia. It ends before Inspector Lee exits the café and realizes that Miss Chin's version of the story may not be the real one. Also, new footage is inserted of the authorities apprehending one of the killers after their climactic duel.
parameter 28: A 10 minute short version, on 35mm film, was shown at some short film festivals.
parameter 29: The UK cinema version was cut to remove death blows, shots of men spitting blood and the pole fight.
